long_description: Our Novara Moxie 24 in. girls' bike is well-suited to adventure, thanks to a plush suspension fork, versatile tires and 21 speeds that make it easy for her to keep up or forge ahead on her own. Resilient aluminum frame is lightweight and durable, making it easy for kids to manage. SR Suntour XCT JR suspension fork soaks up bumps and helps kids maintain control. Smooth-shifting 21-speed drivetrain gives kids lots of gear choices to tackle changing terrain and gradients; shifting gears is as easy as a simple flick of the wrist. Powerful, trustworthy Tektro linear-pull brakes are easy to use. Versatile tread on the Kenda tires rolls smoothly on the pavement and delivers confident traction off-road. Front down tube deflector helps to keep your kid somewhat clean and protected from flying mud. Included kickstand makes it easy to prop the bike up when they venture off. Specs on our Novara Moxie 24 in. bike are subject to change.
